titleStmt.title: A true copy of a letter written from Sir W. Saintliger, Lord President of Munster, to the Lord Lieutenant of Ireland also, the votes of the Parliament, concerning Sir John Hotham.
titleStmt.author: Saintliger, W. (William), Sir, d. 1642.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E.G. for John Franke ...,

notesStmt.note: Dated and signed (p. [8]): Corke April 2, 1642. W. Saintleger.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
